#summary Autonomous Recharging Documentation for the ICARUS Rover
= Testing =
== Test Camera Operation ==
{{{
luvcview
--or--
sudo ./test
--or--
sudo ./tracking
}}}

= Operating Instructions =
== Perform Image Acquisition Process ==
 # Terminal 1:
{{{
roscore
}}}
 # Terminal 2:
{{{
cd ~/catkin_ws
roslaunch icarus_rover_rc acquire_train_images.launch 
}}}
